import React, { useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faArrowDown } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faArrowUp } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default function BillingTransaction() { const userTransaction = [ { transactionName: "Netflix" , transactionTime: "27 March 2020, at 12:30 PM" , transactionStatus: true , transactionAmount: 2500 }, { transactionName: "Apple" , transactionTime: "27 March 2020, at 12:30 PM" , transactionStatus: false , transactionAmount: 2500 }, { transactionName: "Stripe" , transactionTime: "26 March 2020, at 13:45 PM" , transactionStatus: false , transactionAmount: 800 }, { transactionName: "HubSpot" , transactionTime: "26 March 2020, at 12:30 PM" , transactionStatus: false , transactionAmount: 1700 }, { transactionName: "Webflow" , transactionTime: "26 March 2020, at 05:00 AM" , transactionStatus: false , transactionAmount: 1500 }, { transactionName: "Microsoft" , transactionTime: "25 March 2020, at 16:30 PM" , transactionStatus: false , transactionAmount: 987 }, ] let moneyTransClass = ""; const Transactionsloop = userTransaction.forEach(element => { if(element.transactionStatus) { ; } else { moneyTransClass = "debit"; } (element.transactionStatus) ? moneyTransClass = "credit" : setMoneyTransClass("debit"); }); return ( <>

Your Transactions

  • {userTransaction[0].transactionName}

    {userTransaction[0].transactionTime}

    $ {userTransaction[0].transactionAmount}

  • {userTransaction[1].transactionName}

    {userTransaction[1].transactionTime}

    $ {userTransaction[1].transactionAmount}

) }
